00050     /**
00051      * connect to the database
00052      */
00053     function connect() {
00054         kataMakeTmpPath('db');
00055 
00056         $db = str_replace('KATATMP/',KATATMP.'db'.DS,$this->dbconfig['database']);
00057         $this->link = new PDO($db,null,null,!empty($this->dbconfig['options'])?$this->dbconfig['options']:null);
00058         if (!$this->link) {
00059             throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not open database " . $db);
00060         }
00061         $this->link->setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE,PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION);
00062 
00063         if (!empty ($this->dbconfig['encoding'])) {
00064             $this->setEncoding($this->dbconfig['encoding']);
00065         }
00066     }
00067 
00068     /**
00069      * if we are already connected
00070      * @return bool
00071      */
00072     function isConnected() {
00073         return (bool) $this->link;
00074     }
00075 
00076     /**
00077      * return the current link to the database, connect first if needed
00078      */
00079     public function getLink() {
00080         if (!$this->link) {
00081             $this->connect();
00082         }
00083         return $this->link;
00084     }

00087      * inject database link into dbo

00089     public function setLink($l) {

00093     /**
00094      * execute this query
00095      * @return mixed
00096      */
00097     private function execute($sql) {
00098         if (!$this->link) {
00099             $this->connect();
00100         }
00101 
00102         $start = microtime(true);
00103         $error = '';
00104         $this->result = $this->link->query($sql);
00105         if (false === $this->result) {
00106             $error = implode(';',$this->link->errorInfo());
00107             writeLog($error . ': ' . $sql, KATA_ERROR);
00108             throw new DatabaseErrorException($error,$sql);
00109         }
00110         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00111             $this->queries[] = array (
00112                 kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00113                 trim($sql),
00114                 (false !== $this->result)?$this->result->rowCount():'',
00115                 $error,
00116                  (microtime(true) - $start) . 'sec'
00117             );
00118         }
00119     }

00125     }

00127     /**
00128      * return numbers of rows affected by last query
00129      * @return int
00130      */
00131     private function lastAffected() {
00132         if (($this->link) && ($this->result instanceof PDOStatement)) {
00133             return $this->result->rowCount();
00134         }
00135         $null = null;
00136         return $null;
00137     }

00139     /**
00140      * return id of primary key of last insert
00141      * @return mixed
00142      */
00143     private function lastInsertId($name=null) {
00144         $id = $this->link->lastInsertId($name);
00145         return $id;
00146     }

00148     /**
00149      * return the result of the last query.
00150      * @param mixed $idname if $idname is false keys are simply incrementing from 0, if $idname is string the key is the value of the column specified in the string
00151      */
00152     private function & lastResult($idnames = false) {
00153         $result = array ();
00154         if ($this->result instanceof PDOStatement) {
00155             if ($idnames === false) {
00156                 $result = $this->result->fetchAll(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00157             } else {
00158                 while (1) {
00159                     $row = $this->result->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00160                     if (false === $row) {
00161                         break;
00162                     }
00163                     
00164                     $current = & $result;
00165                     foreach ($idnames as $idname) {
00166                         if (!isset($row[$idname])) {
00167                             var_dump('row',$row,'ids',$idnames);
00168                             throw new InvalidArgumentException('Cant order result by field "'.$idname.'" because its nonexistant in resultset');
00169                         }
00170                         if ($row[$idname] === null) {
00171                             $row[$idname] = 'null';
00172                         }
00173                         $current = & $current[$row[$idname]];
00174                     } //foreach
00175                     $current = $row;
00176                 } //while fetch
00177             } //idnames
00178         } //rows>0
00179         return $result;
00180     }

00182     /**
00183      * REPLACE works exactly like INSERT,
00184      * except that if an old row in the table has the same value as a new row for a PRIMARY KEY or a UNIQUE  index,
00185      * the old row is deleted before the new row is inserted
00186      *
00187      * @param string $tableName replace from this table
00188      * @param array $fields name=>value pairs of new values
00189      * @param string $pairs enquoted names to escaped pairs z.B.[name]='value'
00190      * @return int modified rows.
00191      */
00192     function replace($tableName, $fields, $pairs) {
00193         return $this->query('REPLACE INTO ' . $tableName . ' SET ' . $pairs);
00194     }
00195 
00196     /**
00197      * execute query and return useful data depending on query-type
00198      *
00199      *      SELECT / SHOW                                           => resultset array
00200      *      REPLACE / UPDATE / DELETE / ALTER                       => affected rows (int)
00201      *      INSERT                                                  => last insert id (int)
00202      *      RENAME / LOCK / UNLOCK / TRUNCATE /SET / CREATE / DROP  => Returns if the operation was successfull (boolean)
00203      *
00204      * @param string $s sql-statement
00205      * @param string $idname which field-value to use as the key of the returned array (false=dont care)
00206      * @return array
00207      */
00208     function & query($s, $idnames = false, $fields = false) {
00209         $result = null;
00210         switch ($this->getSqlCommand($s)) {
00211             case 'replace' :
00212             case 'update' :
00213             case 'delete' :
00214             case 'alter' :
00215             case 'call':
00216                 $this->execute($s);
00217                 $result = $this->lastAffected();
00218                 break;
00219             case 'insert' :
00220                 $this->execute($s);
00221                 $result = $this->lastInsertId();
00222                 break;
00223             case 'select' :
00224             case 'show' :
00225                 if (is_string($idnames)) {
00226                     $idnames = array (
00227                         $idnames
00228                     );
00229                 }
00230                 $this->execute($s);
00231                 $result = $this->lastResult($idnames, $fields);
00232                 break;
00233             default :
00234                 $this->execute($s);
00235                 $result = $this->result;
00236                 break;
00237         }
00238         return $result;
00239     }

00241     /**
00242      * escape the given string so it can be safely appended to any sql
00243      * @param string $sql string to escape
00244      * @return string
00245      */
00246     function escape($sql) {
00247         $sql = $this->link->quote($sql);
00248         return substr($sql,1,-1);
00249     }

00252      * return sql needed to convert unix timestamp to datetime
00253      * @param integer $t unixtime
00254      * @return string
00255     */
00256     function makeDateTime($t) {
00257         return 'datetime('.$t.', \'unixepoch\');';

00260     /**
00261      * output any queries made, how long it took, the result and any errors if DEBUG>1
00262      */
00263     function __destruct() {
00264         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00265             array_unshift($this->queries, array (
00266                 'line',
00267                 '',
00268                 'affected',
00269                 'error',
00270                 'time'
00271             ));
00272             kataDebugOutput($this->queries, true);
00273         }
00274         if ($this->link) {
00275             unset($this->link);
00276         }
00277     }

00279     private function getFieldSize($str) {
00280         $x1 = strpos($str, '(');
00281         $x2 = strpos($str, ')');
00282         if ((false !== $x1) && (false !== $x2)) {
00283             return substr($str, $x1 +1, $x2 - $x1 -1);
00284         }
00285         return 0;
00286     }
00287 
00288     /**
00289      * return the Sql-Command of given Query
00290      * @param string $sql query
00291      * @return string Sql-Command
00292      */
00293     private function getSqlCommand($sql) {
00294         $sql = str_replace(array (
00295             "(",
00296             "\t",
00297             "\n"
00298         ), " ", $sql);
00299         $Sqlparts = explode(" ", trim($sql));
00300         return strtolower($Sqlparts[0]);
00301     }

00303     /**
00304      * build a sql-string that returns first matching row
00305      * @param string $sql query
00306      * @param string $perPage expression
00307      * @return string (limited) Query
00308      */
00309     function getFirstRowQuery($sql, $perPage) {
00310         return sprintf('%s LIMIT %d', $sql, $perPage);
00311     }
00312 
00313     /**
00314      * build a sql-string that returns paged data
00315      * @return string finished query
00316      */
00317     function getPageQuery($sql, $page, $perPage) {
00318         return sprintf('%s LIMIT %d,%d', $sql, ($page -1) * $perPage, $perPage);
00319     }

00321     /**
00322      * try to reduce the fields of given table to the basic types bool, unixdate, int, string, float, date, enum
00323      *
00324      * <code>example:
00325      *
00326      * Array
00327      * (
00328      *     [table] => test
00329      *     [primary] => Array
00330      *     [identity]=> a
00331      *     [cols] => Array
00332      *         (
00333      *             [a] => Array
00334      *                 (
00335      *                     [default] => CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
00336      *                     [null] =>
00337      *                     [key]    => 'PRI'
00338      *                     [length] => 0
00339      *                     [type] => date
00340      *                 )
00341      *
00342      *             [g] => Array
00343      *                 (
00344      *                     [default] =>
00345      *                     [null] =>
00346      *                     [key]    => 'UNI'
00347      *                     [length] => 0
00348      *                     [type] => unsupported:time
00349      *                 )
00350      *         )
00351      *
00352      * )
00353      * </code>
00354      *
00355      * @param string $tableName name of the table to analyze
00356      * @return unknown
00357      */
00358     function & describe($tableName) {
00359         $primaryKey = array ();
00360         $identity = null;
00361         $desc = array ();
00362         $cols = array ();
00363         $sql = "SHOW COLUMNS FROM " . $tableName;
00364         $r = mysql_query($sql, $this->getLink());
00365         if (false == $r) {
00366             throw new Exception('model: cant describe, missing rights?');
00367         }
00368         $noResult = true;
00369         while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc($r)) {
00370             $noResult = false;
00371             $data = array ();
00372             $data['default'] = $row['Default'];
00373             $data['null'] = 'NO' != $row['Null'];
00374             $data['length'] = 0;
00375             if ('auto_increment' == $row['Extra']) {
00376                 $identity = $row['Field'];
00377             }
00378             //keys
00379             if ('PRI' == $row['Key']) {
00380                 $primaryKey[] = $row['Field'];
00381             }
00382             $data['key'] = $row['Key'];
00383 
00384             //type
00385             $x = strpos($row['Type'], '(');
00386             $type = $x!==false ? substr($row['Type'], 0, $x) : $row['Type'];
00387             switch ($type) {
00388                 case 'bit' :
00389                     $data['type'] = 'bool';
00390                     $data['length'] = 1;
00391                     break;
00392                 case 'bigint' :
00393                 case 'int' :
00394                 case 'smallint' :
00395                 case 'tinyint' :
00396                 case 'decimal':
00397                     $data['length'] = $this->getFieldSize($row['Type']);
00398                     $data['type'] = 'int';
00399                     break;
00400                 case 'char' :
00401                 case 'varchar' :
00402                     $data['length'] = $this->getFieldSize($row['Type']);
00403                     $data['type'] = 'string';
00404                     break;
00405                 case 'text' :
00406                     $data['type'] = 'string';
00407                     break;
00408                 case 'float' :
00409                 case 'double' :
00410                 case 'real' :
00411                     $data['type'] = 'float';
00412                     break;
00413                 case 'date' :
00414                 case 'datetime' :
00415                 case 'time' :
00416                 case 'timestamp' :
00417                     $data['type'] = 'date';
00418                     break;
00419                 case 'set':
00420                     $data['type'] = 'set';
00421                     $data['values']  = 'foo';
00422                 case 'blob':
00423 
00424                     break;
00425             }
00426             $cols[$row['Field']] = $data;
00427         }
00428 
00429         if ($noResult === true) {
00430             throw new Exception('table does not exists in selected Database');
00431         }
00432 
00433         $desc = array (
00434             'table' => str_replace(array (
00435                 $this->quoteLeft,
00436                 $this->quoteRight
00437             ), '', $tableName),
00438             'primary' => $primaryKey,
00439             'identity' => $identity,
00440             'cols' => $cols
00441         );
00442         return $desc;
00443     }

00445     /**

00447      * @param $string $what spezifies what to get ... null=complete config array
00448      * @return array|string
00449      */
00450     function getConfig($what = null) {
00451         if (!empty ($what)) {
00452             return (isset ($this->dbconfig[$what])) ? $this->dbconfig[$what] : '';
00453         }
00454         return $this->dbconfig;
00455     }

00476     /**
00477      * checks if given operator is valid
00478      * @param string $operator
00479      * @return boolean
00480      */
00481     function isValidOperator($operator) {
00482         if (empty ($operator)) {
00483             return false;
00484         }
00485         $ops = array (
00486             '<=>'=>1,
00487             '='=>1,
00488             '>='=>1,
00489             '>'=>1,
00490             '<='=>1,
00491             '<'=>1,
00492             '<>'=>1,
00493             '!='=>1,
00494             'like'=>1,
00495             'not like'=>1,
00496             'is not null'=>1,
00497             'is null'=>1,
00498             'in'=>1,
00499             'not in'=>1,
00500             'between'=>1
00501         );
00502         return isset($ops[$operator]);
00503     }
